actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to eliminate mandated caps on physicians fees.

summary.text: Amends part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance) of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to eliminate limitations on physician charges and effectively eliminate the distinction between participating and nonparticipating physicians.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to eliminate mandated caps on physicians fees.
